description: Sandra Romain makes bill an offer he can't refuse when she asks, 'Do you want to fuck?' But first he is teased and terrified by one of the scariest femme domes in the business. One never really knows for sure how far Mistress Romain will go to get what she wants, and bill is in her cross hairs as she dishes out verbal humiliation, predicament bondage, whipping, ball slapping, CBT, and eventually keeps up her end of the bargain ' but it's not exactly what bill bargained for.
title: Sandra Romain and Wild Bill
